scripts.install: npm run install-microservices && npm run install-apps
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-auth" "npm run dev-ticket" "npm run dev-vehicle" "npm run dev-permit" "npm run dev-app"
scripts.package: docker build . -t cte-linux-amd64 --platform linux/amd64 && docker save -o cte-linux-amd64.tar cte-linux-amd64
scripts.containerised: npm run build && npm run compose
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-auth && npm run install-ticket && npm run install-vehicle && npm run install-permit && npm run install-driver-app && npm run install-admin-app && npm run install-enforcement-app
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-auth && npm run ci-ticket && npm run ci-vehicle && npm run ci-permit && npm run ci-driver-app && npm run ci-admin-app && npm run ci-enforcement-app
